name: astro-resume-01
title: AstroResume01
desc: Perfect, minimal resume theme with no code configuration option, blog integration and custom stylings.
article:
Stand tall among competitors and launch your career into orbit with Astro.js Theme Resume. Explore the cosmos of possibilities for your professional future today!


Features

â¨ Astro.js v4 Powered: Easy customization options

â¨ UI/UX Design: User-friendly and convincing interface

â¨ Export: Downloadable CV option for the reader

â¨ Showcase: Showcase your Expert Areas, Experience, Education, Projects, Portfolio, Blogs, Skills and Tools with individual sections

â¨ Low Code Customization: No coding required - you can easily customize content and style by 30+ components and style variables

â¨ Tailwind CSS Integration: Easy to edit with light and dark mode

â¨ SEO-Support & Performance: Excellent Lighthouse/PageSpeed scores & sitemap integration

â¨ RSS Feed Support: Keeps your audience updated effortlessly

â¨ Framework of your choice: 100% Astro.js only template - choose your JS Framework (react preinstalled)

â¨ Markdown Compatibility: Streamlines content creation with easy formatting

â¨ Syntax Highlighting: Enhances code snippet readability for tech enthusiasts

â¨ ESLint / Prettier: pre-installed and pre-configured to keep your workflow simple

â¨ Vercel Deployment: preconfigured Vercel deployment & web analytics


Coming soon...

â¨ HeadlessCMS Support -> write me wishes to the product you want
